E: The stupid thing is touching the ground

c: And you too. You helped him.
Since you got me in here, why notget me out?
Even if you were to close this   game.
I told you not to play it.
But you just couldn't keep your  eyes off it.
You wanted so dearly to see what was within this "arcade" game.
Well, I suppose I should thank   you for stalling long enough.
Well, taken, is an overstatement.It's more like copied.
Your naivete has given me your   body.
And it did a damn good job.
Thanks for disobeying the        all-mighty Borp Applan. And thankyou for playing :)
